laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B EIA
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B. (Reference Range-Negative).

abdomen.colon: good opacification from the level of the end colostomy through the cecum, with reflux of contrast through the ileocecal valve into distal bowel loops
abdomen.small_bowel: no dilatation to suggest an obstruction

lung_bases.consolidation: within the visualized portion of the right lower lobe
lung_bases.atelectasis: trace in the left lower lobe

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Substantial improvement in the size of fluid collection from 7.7 x 3.5 x 7.6 cm to 6 x 2.5 x 3 cm.
